--- title: Trapezius Muscles --- # Overview ::: {#tbl-oian .cell message='false' execution_count=1} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ```{=html}
Muscle Origin Insertion Innervation Action
Lower trapezius T5-T12 SP Scapular spine Accessory n. (CN XI)
C3 - C4		 Scapula: Retraction, Depression, Upward rotation, Stabilizes scapula on thorax
Middle trapezius Aponeurosis of T1-T4 SP Acromion Accessory n. (CN XI)
C3 - C4		 Scapula: Retraction
Upper trapezius Occiput
SP C1-C7		 lateral 1/3 of Clavicle Accessory n. (CN XI)
C3 - C4		 Scapula: Elevation, Upward rotatino
Neck: I/L sidebend, C/L Rotation
``` ::: ::: # Upper Trapezius AKA Descending part of the trapezius ## Origin: - [Occipital bone]({{< var ref-occipital-bone.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - SP of C1–C7 @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Insertion {#insertion}: [Clavicle (lateral one third)]({{< var ref-clavicle-bone.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Nerve: - **Motor**: [CN XI Accessory n.]({{< var ref-cn11.path >}}) ([C3]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c3 >}}), [C4]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c4 >}})) @brazisLocalizationClinicalNeurology2022 - **Proprioception**: Cervical plexus ([C2]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c2 >}}), [C3]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c3 >}}), [C4]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c4 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Action {#action} - **Scapula**: Elevation, Upward rotation @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **Neck**: I/L sidebend and C/L rotation @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Middle Trapezius OIAN AKA Transverse part of the trapezius ## Origin Aponeurosis at T1–T4 SP @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Insertion {#insertion}: [Acromion of Scapula]({{< var ref-scapula-bone.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Nerve: - **Motor**: [CN XI Accessory n.]({{< var ref-cn11.path >}}) ([C3]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c3 >}}), [C4]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c4 >}})) @brazisLocalizationClinicalNeurology2022 - **Proprioception**: Cervical plexus ([C2]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c2 >}}), [C3]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c3 >}}), [C4]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c4 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Action - Scapular retraction @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - Stabilize the scapula during upward rotation @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - Stabilizes the serratus anterior during upward rotation by counteracting the protraction Serratus Anterior @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Lower Trapezius OIAN ## Origin SP of T5–T12 @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Insertion {#insertion} [Scapular Spine]({{< var ref-scapula-bone.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Nerve: - **Motor**: [CN XI Accessory n.]({{< var ref-cn11.path >}}) ([C3]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c3 >}}), [C4]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c4 >}})) @brazisLocalizationClinicalNeurology2022 - **Proprioception**: Cervical plexus ([C2]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c2 >}}), [C3]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c3 >}}), [C4]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c4 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Action **STJ**: Retraction, Depression, Upward Rotation @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020
